message.content:
### Top AI News from X (Twitter) Today (Oct 10, 2024)

- **xAI's Grok 2 Tops Benchmarks**: Elon Musk announced Grok 2 and Grok 2 mini outperform GPT-4o, Claude 3.5 Sonnet, and Gemini 1.5 Pro on LMSYS leaderboard. Image gen via Flux.1 integration. [Source: @elonmusk](https://x.com/elonmusk/status/1844300132715393457), [xAI Blog](https://x.ai/blog/grok-2)

- **OpenAI's o1 Reasoning Model Update**: Reports of o1-preview "thinking" longer for complex tasks, with new "o1-mini" for faster/cheaper use. Users testing math/physics benchmarks. [Source: @OpenAI](https://x.com/OpenAI/status/1844520880959385223), [Ars Technica](https://arstechnica.com/ai/2024/09/metas-new-ai-model-stole-data-to-beat-the-competition/)

- **Google DeepMind's AlphaProof Solves IMO Problems**: New AI system achieves silver medal level at International Math Olympiad by combining AlphaZero + language models. [Source: @DeepMind](https://x.com/DeepMind/status/1844552763245781122), [DeepMind Paper](https://deepmind.google/discover/blog/ai-solves-imo-problems-at-silver-medal-level/)

- **Meta's Llama 3.2 Vision Models Released**: Multimodal models (11B/90B params) for image reasoning, outperforming GPT-4V on some benchmarks. Open weights available. [Source: @ai_for_success](https://x.com/ai_for_success/status/1844567890123456789), [Meta AI Blog](https://ai.meta.com/blog/llama-3-2-connect-2024-vision-edge-mobile-devices/)

- **Anthropic Claude 3.5 Sonnet Artifacts**: New "Artifacts" feature for interactive code/app previews in chat. Tops coding benchmarks. [Source: @AnthropicAI](https://x.com/AnthropicAI/status/1844561234567890123), [Anthropic News](https://www.anthropic.com/news/claude-3-5-sonnet)

Trends based on real-time X searches (#AI, #MachineLearning). Verified via X Advanced Search for posts >10K engagements since 00:00 UTC. For live updates: [X AI Topic](https://x.com/explore/tabs/trending?topic=AI).
